entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain. Low 12.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending late this evening then clearing. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 this evening. Low 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 10 September 2016
